Available features

You can find below the full list of features supported by Dandelion Webanalytics and the correspondence between the JSP Taglib attributes and the Thymeleaf dialect ones.
JSP Taglib Thymeleaf dialect

Tracker features
Define a provider provider wa:provider More details »
Define the Provider Token token wa:token More details »
Enabled general configuration wa:tracker More details »
Usage of Dandelion Assets useAssets Native More details »
